turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm good. I wanted to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a caramel cloud macchiato, I think that's how you pronounce it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any whipped cream or ad-ons?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No add-ons.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, and where did you want to pick up your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh. And I want it to be a short drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, where did you want to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Austin, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a short caramel cloud macchiato with almond milk from the starbucks on 6th street in Austin.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're all set, your drink will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get a reciept via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: okay.
